actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: To extend changes to requirements for admission of nonimmigrant nurses in health professional shortage areas made by the Nursing Relief for Disadvantaged Areas Act of 1999.
short_title: Underserved Area Nursing Relief Restoration Act of 2010

summary.text: Underserved Area Nursing Relief Restoration Act of 2010 - Amends the Nursing Relief for Disadvantaged Areas Act of 1999 to extend the H-1C visa program providing nonimmigrant nurses in health professional shortage areas.

titles.title: Underserved Area Nursing Relief Restoration Act of 2010
To extend changes to requirements for admission of nonimmigrant nurses in health professional shortage areas made by the Nursing Relief for Disadvantaged Areas Act of 1999.
